summary: The Biomanufacturing and Jobs Act of 2025 amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to bolster the biobased products industry. The bill aims to improve the BioPreferred Program, expand the role of the Department of Agriculture, increase federal purchasing of biobased products, strengthen domestic manufacturing, and support rural economies. It defines key terms like "bio-attributed plastic" and "bioproduct," mandates training on biobased product purchasing, updates federal procurement systems, and establishes a Biobased Task Force. It also addresses public marketing, labeling, and reporting requirements related to the biobased products industry.
